Package org.cibseven.bpm.engine.impl.persistence.entity.util

Class ByteArrayField

java.lang.Object
org.cibseven.bpm.engine.impl.persistence.entity.util.ByteArrayField
public class ByteArrayField extends Object
A byte array value field what load and save ByteArrayEntity. It can be used in an entity which implements ValueFields.
Author:
Philipp Ossler
